bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign of difficult breathing, as if there were an obstacle in the throat blocking the passage of qi. Ben cao yan yi 本草衍義 Substance Entry ha jie 蛤蚧：喉中氣塞，胸鬲噎痛，蛤蚧、阿膠、 生犀角、鹿角膠、羚羊角一兩；除膠外，皆為屑，次入膠，分四服 , “[For curing] qi blockage in the throat , with choking and pain in the region of chest and diaphragm: 1 liang each of ha jie , a jiao , fresh xi jiao , lu jiao glue, and ling yang jiao . Except for the glues, work all items into crumbs and one by one add them to the glues. Divide into four portions and ingest”.
